thumbnails.stage: Start of the Journey (Redtember's Call to Adventure)

artifacts.name: The Frost Wick
artifacts.description: A frost-covered, dim wick as an NFT-amulet, symbolizing Redtember's -10% chill. It glows faintly Neon-Orange when the holder DYORs – a warning against the freeze. In the lore: The hero's initial call, sparking life in the cold; Crypto-connection: A wallet tool sending dip alerts.

artifacts.name: The Shadow Key
artifacts.description: A shimmering, translucent glass key that unlocks Halving chains in Redtember's shadows, revealing hidden lore hints on hover. In the lore: The hero's first test to break the cold; Crypto-connection: A DeFi key unlocking liquidity pools in bear markets.

artifacts.name: The Ignition Pumpkin
artifacts.description: A pumpkin artifact with BTC-carving, emitting Neon-Green sparks when clicked, activating +28% pump rituals. In the lore: The hero's awakening where the spark ignites; Crypto-connection: A PFP-generator tool creating spooky avatars from keywords.

artifacts.name: The Ghost Call
artifacts.description: A translucent horn key that awakens spirits and sends FOMO sparks. In the lore: The hero's transition from the ordinary world; Crypto-connection: An oracle alarm predicting Uptober trends (+3.22% 2025).

artifacts.name: The Leverage Sword
artifacts.description: A flaming sword that slashes chains, generating 83% green momentum sparks. In the lore: The hero's tests to find allies; Crypto-connection: A candle carver tool simulating leverage ($130k).

artifacts.name: The FOMO Shield
artifacts.description: A translucent shield of Green sparks, deflecting rugs. In the lore: The hero's fight against the cold; Crypto-connection: A wallet scanner warning of rug pulls.

artifacts.name: The Chain Breaker
artifacts.description: A hammer artifact smashing Halving chains, releasing sparks. In the lore: The hero's deepest abyss; Crypto-connection: A DeFi unlocker for Moonvember yields ($130k).

artifacts.name: The Blood Moon Crystal
artifacts.description: A crystal glowing under moonlight, amplifying FOMO. In the lore: The hero's ordeal; Crypto-connection: An oracle crystal for Moonvember forecasts.

artifacts.name: The Supernova Orb
artifacts.description: An orb-shaped artifact exploding in Green sparks. In the lore: The hero's revelation; Crypto-connection: A tool visualizing $130–150k simulations.

artifacts.name: The Wisdom Wick
artifacts.description: A wick holding eternal flames. In the lore: The hero's transformation; Crypto-connection: A HODL tracker for Moonvember gains.

artifacts.name: The Rune Shield
artifacts.description: A shield with runes, protecting chain ash. In the lore: The hero's integration; Crypto-connection: A staking shield for Moonvember rewards.

artifacts.name: The Glowing Ash Amulet
artifacts.description: An amulet of glowing ash. In the lore: The hero's atonement; Crypto-connection: A yield farming amulet for $Cryptober.

artifacts.name: The Seal Pumpkin
artifacts.description: A sealed pumpkin holding gains. In the lore: The hero's gift to the world; Crypto-connection: A vault tool for Pumpcember locks.

artifacts.name: The Eternal Spark
artifacts.description: A spark reigniting the wick. In the lore: The hero's return; Crypto-connection: An airdrop trigger for Pumpcember.

artifacts.name: The Freedom Halo
artifacts.description: A halo shining under moonlight. In the lore: The hero's new life; Crypto-connection: An oracle halo for future cycles.

artifacts.name: The Glowing Wick
artifacts.description: A wick that burns eternally. In the lore: The hero's freedom; Crypto-connection: A HODL amulet for eternal rituals.

artifacts.name: The Legacy Runes
artifacts.description: Runes binding cycles. In the lore: The hero's enduring impact; Crypto-connection: A community rune tool for lore extensions.

artifacts.name: The Immortal Spark
artifacts.description: A spark that reignites anew. In the lore: The hero's legacy; Crypto-connection: An NFT spark for $Cryptober holders.
